scripts.deploy: npm run clean:opennext && npm run build:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && node scripts/retry-wrangler-deploy.mjs deploy --config wrangler.jsonc --env=production --keep-vars
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run clean:opennext && npm run build:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && node scripts/retry-wrangler-deploy.mjs deploy --config wrangler.jsonc --env=staging --keep-vars
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run clean:opennext && npm run build:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && node scripts/retry-wrangler-deploy.mjs deploy --config wrangler.jsonc --env=production --keep-vars
scripts.upload: npm run clean:opennext && npm run build:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && opennextjs-cloudflare upload
scripts.preview: npm run clean:opennext && npm run build:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipNextBuild && opennextjs-cloudflare preview
